IAzureKinect

Base interface shared across all image types

Functions
NextFrame
virtual bool NextFrame(
IImage **ppColorImage,
IImage **ppDepthImage,
IImage **ppIRImage
) = 0

Retrieves the next color/depth/ir image from the camera Parameters: ppColorImage - returns the next color image retrieved from the camera. Maybe nullptr.  ppDepthImage - returns the next depth image retrieved from the camera. Maybe nullptr.  ppIRImage - returns the next infrared image retrieved from the camera. Maybe nullptr.
